```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)

library(tidyposterior)
library(plyr)
library(caret)
library(randomForest)
library(tidymodels)
library(gbm)
library(DataExplorer)
library(tidyverse)
library(pROC)


# loading data -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

churn_data <- read_csv("data/src/WA_Fn-UseC_-Telco-Customer-Churn.csv") %>% 
     filter(!is.na(TotalCharges)) %>%
     select(-customerID)


# data sampling ------------------------------------------------------------------------------

seed <- 7312
set.seed(seed)
data_split <- initial_split(churn_data, strata = "Churn")
churn_train <- training(data_split)
churn_test  <- testing(data_split)

trainX <- churn_train %>%
     select(-Churn)
trainY <- churn_train %>%
     select(Churn)

plot_roc <- function(x) {
        averaged <- x %>%
                group_by(rowIndex, obs) %>%
                summarise(Yes = mean(Yes, na.rm = TRUE))
        roc_obj <- roc(
                response = x[["obs"]], 
                predictor = x[["Yes"]], 
                levels = rev(levels(x$obs))
        )
        return(roc_obj)
}
# creating recipe ----------------------------------------------------------------------------

basic_rec <- recipe(Churn ~ ., data = churn_train) %>%
     step_zv(all_predictors()) %>%
     step_dummy(all_predictors()) %>%
     step_center(all_predictors()) %>%
     step_scale(all_predictors())

metric <- "ROC"

ctrl <- trainControl(method = "cv",
                     classProbs = TRUE,
                     summaryFunction = twoClassSummary,
                     savePredictions = "final")
```


Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Model 1 Performance

```{r}
set.seed(seed)

gbmGrid <- expand.grid(n.trees = 100,
                       interaction.depth = 2,
                       shrinkage = .07,
                       n.minobsinnode = 10)
     
gbm_mod <- train(basic_rec, 
                 data = churn_train, 
                 method = "gbm",
                 tuneGrid = gbmGrid,
                 trControl = ctrl,
                 metric = metric,
                 verbose = FALSE)



# model accuracy ----------------------------------------------------------------------------

roc_gbm <- plot_roc(gbm_mod$pred)

ggroc(roc_gbm, alpha = 0.5, colour = "red", size = 1.5)
```

### Model 2 Performance

```{r}
rfGrid <- expand.grid(.mtry = 4.5)


# Model 2 run -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

rf_mod <- train(basic_rec, 
                data = churn_train, 
                method = "rf",
                tuneGrid = rfGrid,
                trControl = ctrl,
                metric = metric,
                ntree = 500,
                verbose = FALSE)

# model accuracy ----------------------------------------------------------------------------

roc_rf <- plot_roc(rf_mod$pred)

ggroc(roc_rf, alpha = 0.5, colour = "red", size = 1.5)
```

### Model 3 Performance

```{r}
set.seed(seed)
is_two_levels <- function(x) length(unique(x)) == 2 & is.numeric(x)
probably_dummy <- vapply(churn_train, is_two_levels, logical(1))
dummies <- names(probably_dummy)[probably_dummy]

no_dummies <- recipe(Churn ~ ., data = churn_train) %>%
     step_bin2factor(!!! dummies) %>%
     step_zv(all_predictors())

nbGrid <- expand.grid(usekernel = TRUE,
                              fL = 0.4, 
                              adjust = seq(0.5, 5, by = 0.5))

nb_mod <- train(
     no_dummies,
     data = churn_train,
     method = "nb",
     metric = "ROC",
     tuneGrid = nbGrid,
     trControl = ctrl
)

# model accuracy ----------------------------------------------------------------------------

roc_nb <- plot_roc(nb_mod$pred)

ggroc(list(randomForest=roc_rf, naiveBayes=roc_nb, GBM=roc_gbm))
```

### Model Selection

```{r, echo=FALSE}
rs <- resamples(
     list(Boosting = gbm_mod, RndmFrst = rf_mod, NaiveB = nb_mod)
)

roc_mod <- suppressMessages(perf_mod(rs, seed = seed, iter = 5000))

roc_dist <- tidy(roc_mod)

ggplot(roc_dist)
```
